name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add beautiful image on Google landing page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This App will add the background image on Google Landing page, it greatly improve your daily mood.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The homepage image takes you to new places every day. Users tell us how they escape to a far-off vista during their coffee break, and how their children look forward to sitting down each afternoon to learn about a new creature and its curious habitat.
